_readme: OPTIONAL MCP Integrations — Digital Marketing Pro. These connect to YOUR OWN marketing accounts. The plugin works fully without any of these. To enable an integration, set the required environment variables and the server auto-activates. Only enable what you need.

google-analytics.description: Google Analytics 4 — traffic, conversions, audience data for performance reports

google-search-console.description: Google Search Console — ranking data, queries, CTR for SEO audits

google-ads.description: Google Ads — campaign performance, keyword data, bid optimization

meta-marketing.description: Meta Business Suite — Facebook/Instagram ads, audience insights, performance

hubspot.description: HubSpot CRM — contacts, deals, email performance, pipeline data

slack.description: Slack — send marketing reports, campaign alerts, team notifications

google-sheets.description: Google Sheets — export reports, campaign data, content calendars to spreadsheets

mailchimp.description: Mailchimp — email campaign analytics, list management, automation data

stripe.description: Stripe — revenue data, conversion tracking, LTV calculations

linkedin-marketing.description: LinkedIn Marketing — ad performance, audience targeting, company page analytics

semrush.description: SEMrush — keyword research, competitor analysis, backlink data, site audit

ahrefs.description: Ahrefs — backlink profiles, keyword explorer, content gap analysis
